nodes.text: The Teyan Apologia was a set of books written by Jedi Master Simikarty and those who followed his philosophy. They were named for the Teyan Praxeum at which they were written.

The books contained discussions and suggestions on how the Jedi Order could more effectively serve the Galactic Republic. This included training Jedi only from infancy, as Simikarty believed that once grown, intelligent beings could not fully negate their negative emotions.
There were six volumes known to form the Teyan Apologia.
